name: ncs-security-validators
description: Security validators for NCS Psicóloga Zaragoza project

scripts.security:cms: cd cms && npm run security:audit && npm run security:dependencies && npm run security:config && npm run security:secrets
scripts.security:web: cd web && npm run security:audit && npm run security:dependencies && npm run security:config && npm run security:secrets
scripts.install:all: cd cms && npm install && cd ../web && npm install

author: NCS Psicóloga Zaragoza
